long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yelp Scraper – the ultimate browser extension for effortlessly extracting comprehensive business data from Yelp. Designed with simplicity and power in mind, this tool is your go-to solution for obtaining valuable insights into local businesses, all with just a few clicks. Whether you're a market researcher, business owner, or data enthusiast, this is tailored to meet your needs.

Key Features:

- Extensive Data Fields: Access a wide range of information including Business ID, Title, Rating, Review Count, Name, URL, Contact Details, Location Coordinates, Operational Hours, and much more.
- User-Friendly Interface: Easily navigate and operate the extension with a simple "Download" button that appears next to the search bar on Yelp's category or search result pages.
- Multiple Export Formats: Choose from CSV, JSON, or XLSX formats for your data export, allowing for seamless integration with your existing workflows or analysis tools.
- Speedy Results: Initiate the data extraction process instantly and receive prompt results, no matter the volume of data you're dealing with.
- Data Privacy Assurance: With a commitment to your privacy, all data is processed on your device without being stored or transmitted to external servers, ensuring your information remains secure and confidential.

How to Use:

1. Navigate to a category page on Yelp.com or perform a search to find the businesses you're interested in.
2. On the listing or search results page, simply click the "Download" button that appears next to the search bar to start the data scraping process. A pop-up window will display the progress.
3. Once the scraping is complete or paused, you can download the data directly from the pop-up window.
4. Additionally, you can customize your data preferences by selecting your desired data format on the extension's settings page.

Why Choose Yelp Scraper?

- Efficiency: Save time and effort by automating the data collection process.
- Accuracy: Obtain reliable and up-to-date business information.
- Customization: Tailor the data output to your specific needs.
- Convenience: Extract and export data without the need for complex software or programming knowledge.
- Security: Feel confident with a tool that prioritizes the protection of your data.

Elevate your data collection game with Yelp Business Scraper – your efficient, reliable, and secure partner in data extraction. Get started today and transform the way you gather business intelligence!

Disclaimer 
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with YELP.
